QueryToExecute:
with global_trails as (
  select
    count(*) as total
  from
    aws_cloudtrail_trail
  where
    is_multi_region_trail
  )
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when total > 1 then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when total > 1 then name || ' is one of ' || total || ' global trails.'
    else name || ' is the only global trail.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_cloudtrail_trail,
  global_trails
where
  is_multi_region_trail;
